address_check_tips1:
Welcome to U-Shield Address Risk Detection
‚úÖ Supports address queries on both TRON and ETH networks
‚úÖ The system evaluates and analyzes based on on-chain behavior, risk labels, and associated entities

📊 Risk Level Description:
🟢 Low Risk (0‚Äì30): No suspicious transactions; not linked to known risky entities
🟡 Medium Risk (31‚Äì70): Limited high-risk interactions; unclear counterparties
🟠 High Risk (71‚Äì90): Frequent unusual transfers; potential ties to malicious addresses
🔴 Extreme Risk (91‚Äì100): Involvement in scams, sanctions, hacking, money laundering, or other high-risk activities

📌 Each user gets 1 free detection per day
📌 Additional detections cost {address_detection_cost} TRX or {address_detection_cost_usdt} USDT (TRX will be deducted first if available)

💰 Current Balance:

TRX: {tron_amount}

USDT: {amount}

Please enter the address you want to check 👇

usdt_freeze_alert_tips:
Welcome to UShield USDT Freeze Alert Service

🛡️ UShield - Your On-Chain Asset Guardian!
Once an address is frozen by on-chain risk control, assets become extremely difficult to recover, leading to significant losses!
Hundreds of USDT wallet addresses are frozen and locked every day ‚Äî the risk is real and ever-present!

‚úÖ Ideal for users who:

Frequently send/receive payments

Have been exposed to sanctioned addresses

Have interacted with scam addresses

‚úÖ Supports USDT wallet addresses on TRON/ETH networks

📌 Service Price (per address):

{server_trx_price} TRX / 30 days or {server_usdt_price} USDT / 30 days

🎯 Once activated, UShield provides 24/7 protection for your assets.
‚è∞ The system triggers an early warning mechanism before a freeze occurs, sending alerts every minute for 10 minutes, giving you ample time to move your assets.
📩 All alerts are delivered in real-time via Telegram.
freeze_alert_service_insufficient_balanc: Insufficient balance. Unable to enable freeze alert service.
secondary_contact_tips:
👥 Welcome to the Second Contact Service
To ensure real-time receipt of alert messages, you can bind a second contact Telegram account.
Before binding, please make sure the second contact has already interacted with this bot. After binding, this account will simultaneously receive alert notifications. To replace the second contact, simply repeat the binding steps‚Äîthe system will update it automatically.
Please enter the @username of the second contact's Telegram account 👇

NAACUAMS: No addresses are currently under alert monitoring service.

Notice: Temporary Suspension of TRON Network Deposit Services

Due to recent instability on the TRON network, some transactions may experience delays or failures. To ensure the safety of user assets, we have temporarily suspended deposit services on the TRON network. Services will resume once the network stabilizes.

‚úÖ Other functions‚Äîincluding alerts, detection, and transaction packages‚Äîremain operational and unaffected.

Recommendation:
🔹 If you need to make a deposit, please wait at least 10 minutes before trying again.

We are closely monitoring the TRON network and apologize for any inconvenience caused. Thank you for your understanding.

smart_transaction_plans_tips1:
The system will automatically detect your energy balance. If it is not enough for one transaction, it will automatically replenish your energy. Within the number of transactions purchased, you will no longer burn TRX to purchase transactions, but instead, the fee will be deducted based on the actual energy consumed.  Consuming 65k deducts 1 transaction, consuming 131k deducts 2 transactions.

Explanation 1: If there are no transactions for a long time, 2 transactions will be deducted per day as an occupancy fee. This fee will not be charged if there are transactions.
Explanation 2: Do not make transactions too frequently, as the energy may not have arrived yet. It is recommended to have an interval of at least 1 minute.
Explanation 3: If you enter an idle paused state, please manually turn it on in the list.
smart_transaction_plans_tips:
Welcome to U-Shield Energy Smart Management
‚öô️ Function Introduction
🤖After smart management is enabled, the system will automatically detect the address's energy balance. When the energy is less than 131k, the system will automatically replenish energy.
📌The package transactions are only limited to the bound address and cannot be cross-shared.
🔋Consuming 65k deducts 1 transaction, consuming 131k deducts 2 transactions.
‚õΩEach transaction requires 0.345TRX bandwidth. Please ensure that there is enough TRX in the address.
‚è∞Energy is valid on the same day. If there are no transactions, an occupancy fee of 2 transactions/day will be charged. For consecutive transactions, it is recommended to have an interval of 1 minute.
💤You can turn on or pause management in the list. If the address is idle for two days, the system will automatically pause management.

Wait for the QR code payment address, then transfer the correct amount 7. You will receive the funds within 3 minutes

yhb_desc: Welcome to U Shield U Red Packet Energy Flash Exchange üîπ Transfer {energy_cost} U Red Packet = 1 energy üîπ Transfer {energy_cost_2x} U Red Packet = 2 energy TRX Receiving Address: {yhb_tron_address} BSC U Red Packet Receiving Address: {yhb_bsc_address} Important Notes: 1. One transaction equals {energy_cost} U Red Packet, and so on. (Max 10 transactions = {energy_cost_10x} U Red Packet; excess will not be credited) 2. Transferring to a non-U address requires purchasing two energies 3. After successful transfer to the flash exchange address, energy will be instantly exchanged back via the original recharge address 4. First send your 6-digit birthday (e.g., 0.931018 TRX), or any other 6-digit number, to complete user binding. Then send the last digits of the red packet amount plus .931018 to complete the exchange 5. Energy is valid for one hour U Shield Official Bot: https://t.me/ushield_bot?start=8131076755 Binance Wallet (fee-free), supports free U Red Packet exchange: https://web3.binance.com/zh-CN/token/bsc/0x0d9f4cf4fe0880369e600031e4c4112f4e9a647f OKX Wallet (0.85% fee), supports cross-chain conversion of TRX USDT into U Red Packets: https://web3.okx.com/zh-hans/token/bsc/0x0d9f4cf4fe0880369e600031e4c4112f4e9a647f

‚ö° Energy Proxy Mode
- Acquisition price: 44 SUN
- Annual Percentage Yield (APY): 15.42%
- Daily earnings for every 10,000 TRX staked as energy: 4.23 TRX

üåê Bandwidth Proxy Mode
- Acquisition price: 260 SUN
- APY: 15.51%
- Daily earnings for every 10,000 TRX staked as bandwidth: 4.25 TRX

üí° Additionally, staking TRX grants an extra 3.5% APY voting reward, claimable directly in your wallet app!

This feature is designed for users who have already staked TRX to obtain energy and wish to sell it autonomously.
Recommended wallet: TronLink (BoBo)

Staking process:
In your wallet, go to [Staking] ‚Üí choose [Energy] or [Bandwidth].

Selling process:
In your wallet, click [Energy] or [Bandwidth] ‚Üí select [Proxy] ‚Üí enter the acquisition address ‚Üí send to complete.
